meta_data.title: Oh, to Have Been in That Room
meta_data.subtitle: Galatians 1-2 Thanks to everyone who supports TMBH at  You're the reason we can all do this together!  Music by

All right, that's plenty.
I'm Matt.
This is the 10 Minute Bible Hour podcast.
Let's do this again soon.
